## Usage

Create a stream that will render files using [Template]. Works with [gulp], [verb] and [assemble].

**Example:**

```js
var renderer = require('{%= name %}');
var render = renderer(assemble);
assemble.task('build-posts', function () {
  assemble.src('*.hbs')
    .pipe(render());
});
```

## Run tests

```bash
npm test
```
